resources.string: Add at least one item to category
EduDiary is a simple way to manage and keep track of your educational tasks.
On the main screen you can always see a list of your tasks and their current status.
There is a subject name and a due date on the top of each task. Also there is a set of predefined icons for many subjects.
You can mark any sub-task done by simply clicking on it.
You can edit or delete any task by long-tape on it.
To create a new task tap on the button below.
You have to choose a subject from the list or to type your own. Also you need to set a due date.
Task is divided into categories which are divided into sub-tasks. Category can be name of a book, a page or something else.
To enter a sub-tasks you need to press on the action button on your keyboard.
